column1: 4.6.4.1.1	 Summary of evidence and recommendations for conservative management of nocturia
Offer women with lower urinary tract symptoms (LUTS) lifestyle advice prior to, or concurrent   with, treatment.
Offer pelvic floor muscle training for nocturia (either individually or in the group setting) to   women with urinary incontinence or other storage LUTS.
Offer women with nocturia and a history suggestive of obstructive sleep apnoea a referral to   a sleep clinic for assessment of suitability for continuous positive airway pressure treatment.
